Title: Object: La tentation de St Antoine
Description: St Anthony, praying in a cave before a crucifix and surrounded by monstrous creatures, is interrupted by a demon who points out at a courtesan, with claws instead of feet, walking toward him, a glass in her hand; after David Teniers the Younger. c.1747 Etching
Producer name: Print made by: Jacques Philippe Le Bas
Published by: Jacques Philippe Le Bas
Bibliographic references: IFF / Inventaire du Fonds Français: Bibliothèque Nationale, Département des Estampes (387)
Associated names: Representation of: St Antony of Egypt
